title: Teddy Pendergrass - Live! Coast to Coast 2-CD Set [FLAC+MP3](Big
description:
Source:  CD + Fresh Cover Art Scan

[i]Tags have been edited so Disc 1 and Disc 2 show under 1 Album in most players.

- Big Papi[/i]

[img]http://image.bayimg.com/04890c28bcda064749171272c5136cd2ba14ce3f.jpg[/img]

[quote]By MarvelousMarla VINE VOICE
I bought this CD by mistake when I was looking for one of Teddy Pendergrass' greatest hits collections. Although I do enjoy live recordings, I was looking for a collection of studio recordings that day. Nonetheless, I was not disappointed with this purchase. As a child of the seventies with a mother who adored this man and purchased every record he ever made, I am no stranger this music. I even remember hearing about his sensual ladies only concerts.
Teddy Pendergrass is definitely a legend and this CD captured him at the pinnacle of his career playing before his hometown crowd. You have all the great hits "Life is a Song Worth Singing," "When Somebody Loves You Back," "Close the Door," and of course his signature song "Turn off the Lights."
His style is inimitable and he had a way with a song that just sent chills up your spine. Between his wonderful voice and his commanding physical presence, Teddy P always had a captive audience. This CD is a wonderful tribute to a talented artist. This man is an original, and I love his work.[/quote]
